STBLKeyStringList.Text: You can review this information and helpful Lessons any time from the Help Center button!
Eeeeerp! Is that {0.SimFirstName}'s stomach? Being around death is...disgusting!
Few bonds are stronger than the one between a Loyal Sim and their beloved companion.
It turns out the thief was really just a super fan of the present and was trying to preserve items from the past for the future!
In the depths where the living dare not tread, among the silent watchers of the dead, a chalice card rests with secrets to be read. In these hallowed crypts, let your steps be led.
Forcing Self to Play Genie's Curse
{1.SimFirstName} can't sit up by {1.SimPronounReflexive} yet. This requires the Sit Up Milestone.

There has been a lot going on today. Hidden time capsules, a cryptic note, random accusations towards your neighbors of the near-impossible. That's a lot to ponder. Find a Shower, and select Ponder Time Travel. (You can also use a Bathtub or Toilet!) (+25 Event Points)

Peel back the veil to uncover the secret to richer Sim lives and beyond in The Sims™ 4 Life & Death Expansion Pack. Achieve your dreams in life by ticking items off your Bucket List or pursue them as a Ghost with Unfinished Business. There is a ghastly new world to haunt, a career that'll bring you closer to Grim, Wills to write, Crypts to explore, and even ghostly skills to master. There are no real endings — only transitions — as you move between life, afterlife, and even rebirth. Expansion Pack Features:
  • An Endless Journey
  • A Ghastly, Gorgeous Life
  • Goodbye (For Now)
  • Friendly or Fiendish?
  • A Town Worth Haunting
Warn not to Treat Friends Poorly
Buy your own bar to serve drinks, build your mixology skill, and take your parties to the next level. Bars can be purchased in the Dining Room category of Build/Buy.

This festive season, keep yourself happy and your feet even happier with a pair of Feet Friend Slippers. Available in a range of animal designs from Create a Sim this adorable footwear is perfect for lounging in.
{0.SimFirstName} is awake and in a happy mood!

Having a Career is one of the best ways to make Simoleons! The starting salary can be a bit on the low side, but when you climb the career ladder you can make big bucks.\n\nAdvancing in Careers will also unlock unique Objects and Clothes, and allows your Sim to retire and get a pension upon becoming an Elder.
Yes - and Lewis, the competition is back on!
The next ingredient must bloom from your garden.

Peel back the veil to uncover the secret to richer Sim lives and beyond in The Sims™ 4 Life & Death Expansion Pack. Achieve your dreams in life by ticking items off your Bucket List or pursue them as a Ghost with Unfinished Business. There is a ghastly new world to haunt, a career that'll bring you closer to Grim, Wills to write, Crypts to explore, and even ghostly skills to master. There are no real endings — only transitions — as you move between life, afterlife, and even rebirth. Macabre Mementos Digital Content:
  • Lasting Legacy Family Portrait
  • Mournful Melodies Music Box
  • Plumed Elegance Mask
Wonder at treasures that have endured time's passing, witnessing the come and go of generations with ghastly grace. Look upon those who came before in the Lasting Legacy Family Portrait, listen to the haunting lullaby of the Mournful Melodies Music Box, and masquerade in fowl finery with the Plumed Elegance Mask, available when you order through December 12. Expansion Pack Features:
  • An Endless Journey
  • A Ghastly, Gorgeous Life
  • Goodbye (For Now)
  • Friendly or Fiendish?
  • A Town Worth Haunting
These rich loaves of braided bread are resting and waiting to be enjoyed. Save them for a community or family gathering, or devour them all by yourself with some delicious salts, jam, or honey.
The tiny people living in your computer have big dreams (and worries)! Learn all about Aspirations, Wants, and Fears, and how your Sim can master them to earn powerful rewards.
More expensive Objects are more effective at fulfilling Sims’ Needs. \n\nYou can check which Need an Object can fulfill, and how efficient it is, in the Object’s tooltip in the Build catalog.
Keep logging in each day to claim this reward.

To buy and place an item, simply select it from the Catalog, move the cursor to where you want to place it, and click! The Object’s footprint must be green, which means there is enough space. To rotate a held Object, click the right mouse button, [CTRL + RMB] will rotate in the opposite direction. You can also select an already bought Object to move and rotate it, or sell it by pressing the Sell button.

Begin a new chapter of Life by becoming a Ghost! Exciting Ghostly Powers await in the Afterlife. Perhaps {0.SimFirstName} has some Unfinished Business to attend to? You can also choose to relinquish control of {0.SimFirstName} and allow {0.SimPronounObjective} to stick around as a Freeroaming Ghost.
Like no ordinary Sim, {0.SimFirstName} feels especially bubbly and playful in the water!
This age group is not applicable.

Embrace the mess of daily life or create an organized oasis with The Sims™ 4 Bathroom Clutter Kit. Whether you want to leave makeup and combs scattered on the counter or give your Sims some additional drawers to keep them tidy, the choice is yours with this collection which features bathroom décor for all ages. Kit Features:
  • A Family Room — This kit has something for everyone, from cute wall decals for kids to grandma’s dentures. Create a realistic picture of a family by adding little touches for all ages.
  • Personalized Personal Space — Transform your Sim’s bathroom into an elegant retreat where they can escape life’s mayhem. Or, let that mayhem spill over into this space as well. With this kit you can create spaces that reflect the personalities of a variety of Sims.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.
{0.SimFirstName} passed down their High Metabolism Trait to {1.SimFirstName}! Somehow. It's best not to think about it.

Pablo and Jennifer have grown as parents and developed new traits that will support them in growing a larger family. Pablo has received the Seldom Sleepy trait, ensuring he is prepared to get by on less sleep from now on. Jennifer has developed the Fertile trait, making her more likely to have another set of twins!
Aspirations are long-term goals for Sims. Completing Aspiration goals gives your Sim Satisfaction points to spend in the Rewards Store!

{0.SimFirstName} has learned {1.SimFirstName}'s Romantic Boundaries: • Non-physical romance will trigger jealousy. • Physical romance (excluding {T1.Mess Around}{DAE1.WooHoo}) will not trigger jealousy. • {T1.Mess Around}{DAE1.WooHoo} will trigger jealousy. {1.SimFirstName} is open to reconsidering Romantic Boundaries.

"CAPS LOCK"
Performed by CHINCHILLA
Written by Daisy Matilda Bertenshaw, Morten ‘Mört’ Jepsen
Published by Daisy Bertenshaw Chinchilla Music Ltd - Copyright Control (PRS), Morten ‘Mört’ Jepsen Copyright Control (KODA)
Recording courtesy of Republic Records Ltd./Island Records under license from Universal Music Enterprises
I wish I could time travel! Of course you have to worry about the re-entry. A building that wasn't there, that is there...it boggles the mind.

Chestnut Ridge has a lively social scene. Your Sims can go into town to meet friends at the bar, blow off steam at the dance hall, or train at the equestrian park. They can host cookouts and dances on their ranch, and hire a Ranch Hand to help when the work builds up.

Sims can gain the Photography Skill from the comfort of their Phone!

Click on Take a Photo from the Camera section of your Phone.

Left click this goal for more info
The selected age group does not have this cause of death available and will be removed.

Interacting with the world is how you play in The Sims. Click objects in the world and inside houses to use them or begin activities. Try clicking on a refrigerator or stove to cook a meal, or click on a toilet and...relieve your Sim.

At last! Not only did Nova land her dream job but got rid of Lewis too! She won’t have to see his face at the office, or anywhere on Earth, really! Now she’s ready to kill it as a Startup Entrepreneur.
Try for New Pirates in Coffin

There's more than one way to end a rivalry. The "Befriend Rival" and "Sabotage Rival" Work Tones allow you to remedy the problem while on the job. Meeting up after work is also an option, whether you choose to be friendly or try more...creative solutions.
This is how much you currently owe in total.
Work hard and play hard with animal friends, ranch hands, and your own stretch of land in The Sims™ 4 Horse Ranch!

They say money can’t buy happiness, but it sure helps to keep your Sims content! Learn all about how to earn big Simoleons so your Sims can put food on the table, pay their bills, and build their dream home!
Select the Traits that best describe this Sim

Moving to a new place can be scary—especially if you don't know anyone there—but it can also be a great adventure! Help Farrah explore her new home, make some friends, and throw a moving-in-party that will be the talk of the town!

Grandmother passed away under what her estate lawyer considers to be very mysterious circumstances. While only the siblings know what truly happened, her will ensures that if there is suspicion of foul play, no one will be receiving a dime.
When you select something in an Interaction menu, it will appear in the Action Queue.\n\nIf you’re in a hurry (or changed your mind), you can click on any actions in the queue to cancel them.

Your cooking adventure wouldn’t be complete without the right fashion. Kitchen-ready hairstyles, food themed accessories, and aprons for the whole family will have your Sims looking like serious amateur chefs.
Impress guests with a modern entertainment space and suave fits from The Sims™ 4 Casanova Cave Kit.
No need for sorrow, this is the result of a long, long life.
Nothing adds character and flair to an outfit like accessories! Dress your Sim up in hats, shoes, bracelets, glasses, earrings and more to express their unique sense of style.
These Sims appreciate the familiar but are slow to warm up to new experiences, locations, and Sims.
A temporary rental lot for your vacationing Sims

“Practice”
Performed by Anitta
Written by Remy Gautreau, Maya Kurchner, Julian Michael McGuire (ASCAP), Bernard Alexander Harvey, Tayla Parx (BMI), Emelie Kristina Walcott (STIM)
Published by Songs Of Spirit II o/b/o itself, Arcade Songs Entertainment, and Neptunehouse Music (ASCAP), Chosen People Publishing, LLC (ASCAP) administered by Kobalt Songs Music Publishing, Wolf McGuire Media (ASCAP), Avex USA Hits (BMI), Songs of S10 Publishing (BMI), Songs of Patriot Games (BMI) administered by Sony Music Publishing obo Avex USA, Inc., Taylor Monet Music (BMI), Parx Worldwide Publishing (BMI), Warner-Tamerlane Publishing Corp. (BMI), Lilly Raye Music Publishing (STIM), Warner Chappell Music Scandinavia AB (STIM)
Recording courtesy of Warner Records
Game on! Protect your wall from dart holes with the Bullseye Dartboard.\nDisclaimer: Bullseyes not guaranteed.
To Bind your Voodoo Doll to another Sim, click in your Sim's Inventory and select the Voodoo Doll. Then Click on Bind To and select the Sim you want to Bind.
Handiness Vol 1: Try Not to Die!
Incredible! You did it! It’s amazing that this stuff can bring Sims back to life. It’s time to make my own version of it! Thank you for your help!
Now that you have discovered the secrets of time travel, you must build a time machine to catch the thief in the act!
{1.SimFirstName} has a Need for digital Speed.
Rebirth into this household to join this family.
Congratulations, you have completed the Scoring Simoleons Discovery Quest!

To create a Sim that looks like one of the existing Sims in the Household, you can select Play with Genetics. This tool makes it easy to create a Child, Parent, or Sibling of other Sims in the Household. You can learn more about Genetics in the Lesson Relatives & Relationships.

The key to earning big Simoleons is getting promoted. Your Sim will get promoted when they fulfill their Promotion Requirements and max out the Performance bar. Check out the Career panel to see your progress. Usually, Promotion Requirements are reaching certain Skill levels. To increase your Performance, your Sim should go to work with a positive Emotion and complete their Daily Task before going to work. You can read more about Skills and Emotions in other Live Mode Lessons.

Moving will open the World Map. Lots that you can move to without any modifications are outlined in green. Lots outlined in yellow are either too expensive to buy fully furnished, or another Household already lives there. Pick a Lot and press the Confirm button in the lower right corner to start moving! Remember that you can use the World Select button to move to another World.
As a ghost, I must warn you of imminent danger. Elder exhaustion is creeping closer. Take heed and rest well, for the Netherworld calls not yet.\nYours in ghostly vigilance,\n{0.SimFirstName}

If "Yes" this Sim will have a jealous reaction when a romantic partner engages in non-physical romantic interactions with other Sims.\n\nIf "No" they may have a minor reaction or no reaction, depending on Personality Traits.
Finally! Mistakes from the past have been forgiven. {0.SimFirstName} better not to screw up again!

These finely-tailored Italian-inspired fashions are polished, sophisticated, and feature classic silhouettes. It’s a cohesive collection that feels curated, as if hand-picked by someone with exquisite taste.
{0.SimFirstName} passed down their Essence of Flavor Trait to {1.SimFirstName}!
Read this book to level up your Fishing skill!
This reward is locked. Check back once the week starts.

{0.SimFirstName} can now catch Rainbow Fish from fishing spots where they are found. After aging up to Teen, {0.SimFirstName} will be able to share Fishing Tips to help other Sims improve their angling.
{0.SimFirstName} must finish the current game before starting a new one!
“ALL THE POINTS ARE BELONG TO {0.SimFirstName|xxAllCaps},” the game proclaims, in a big retro font, as the match ends. {0.SimFirstName} is a digital champion!
Another chance for {0.SimFirstName} means that {0.SimPronounSubjective} can do everything that {0.SimPronounSubjective} ever wanted!
A Lease Breaking fee will be applied for moving outside of the Grace Period.
Friendships between Vampires and Werewolves might be frowned upon, but Loyal Sims friendships override any occult law!
Bring the neighbors together – literally – and experience multi-family lots as a tenant or property owner in The Sims™ 4 For Rent Expansion Pack!
Resetting Discovery Quests restores all Discovery Quests to their original state. Rewards will not be given for any previously completed Discovery Quests.
Avoid using mean social interactions during a dinner party. Direct siblings to be kind to each other and heal the rift!
The following actions will take effect when {0.SimFirstName} dies:\n\n{1.String}
This world is unusable because there are no Vacation Rental lots left. Change a lot back into a Vacation Rental in order to have it be usable again.

Households can have up to 8 Sims! Add more Sims by clicking on the Add a Sim button.\n\nChoose Add New Sim to randomize a new Sim to customize. If you want some help setting up a backstory and personality for your new Sim, select Add Sim via a Story.

Determined as ever, it's time for the final plan to be put into action.\n\nThe time travel component is installed and activated, and the computer is sufficiently overclocked. It's time to catch a thief!
Congratulations! {0.SimFirstName} was able to cope with Grief in a healthy way, resulting in a Personality Trait change.
There aren't any Tenants in this Unit to Evict.

{1.SimFirstName} has reconsidered {1.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} Romantic Boundaries after discussing with {0.SimFirstName}.\n\n{1.SimFirstName} will feel jealous from partners doing non-physical romance.
Are you sure you wish to continue?
No one is around to play games with {0.SimFirstName}.
Find a Romantic Partner for Each Sibling
For a Loyal Sim, nothing beats being surrounded by people they can trust!
Allows Sims to initiate a breakup automatically if they see their Romantic Partner breaking their Romantic Boundaries, or if they are Mean to each other while their Romantic Satisfaction is low.
Maxis would like to thank Plumbella for collaborating with us on Pastel Pop.
Lead Client Systems Engineers - Growing Together
A cloying concoction that will give Sims a taste of the afterlife in one ghastly gulp.\n\nRequires Mixology Skill Level 6
This Sim's Romantic Satisfaction is unknown. This can be learned by "Asking about Romantic Satisfaction" which is found in the "Relationship" pie menu category beneath the "Learn More" subcategory.
Open the Phone to Chat or Play a Game
A colorful Freezer Boney calavera, commemorating The Day of the Dead. This Freezer Boney is often placed upon the ofrendas of departed Sims.
{1.SimFirstName}'s may have been loyal, but their partner? Not so much.
{0.SimFirstName} feels very confident while around {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} loved one after repairing their relationship!

Update your Sims’ intimate wardrobe with fashions based on current material, color, and pattern trends. Lacey bodysuits, a variety of underwear styles, and boxers with playful prints will have your Sims’ bedrooms feeling like runways.
You have completed all of the quests in the {0.String} event!
There are a lot of Sims around... Maybe {0.SimFirstName} should leave.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Castle Estate Kit

Each category has a preset filter that determines which clothing options are available. The preset is only a suggestion; feel free to remove or change these filters as you wish!\n\nAlmost all Create a Sim items are available for all genders and Outfit categories if you remove the preset filters.
Bubbles so shiny and pretty! Oooh and they pop!

Congratulations on completing the Welcome Scenario!

As a reward, each Sims in this household have earned unique rewards based on their accomplishments and choices, as well as enough Satisfaction Points to purchase a treat in the Rewards Store! 

You have created a great start for your Sims, but their stories are far from finished!
{0.SimFirstName} hasn't achieved any Milestones in this category at {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} current age.

When manipulating Rooms and Walls, you may notice green and yellow highlights. Green indicates the wall has passed through architecture that will be modified in some way. Yellow indicates an object that will be moved to the Household Inventory, or sold.

Embody the darkness with new goth styles from The Sims™ 4 Goth Galore Kit. You voted for this kit, now get ready to outfit your Sims in fashion inspired by the contemporary goth scene featuring mesh, leather, and that signature moody makeup. Kit Features:
  • Dark and Distinct — Variety isn’t always about color; sometimes it’s about textures and embellishments. Add points of interest with mesh, belts, buckles, straps, and harnesses.
  • Goth on the Go — Your Sims will flirt with their dark sides in platform shoes and sleek silhouettes that are perfect for everyday wear, parties, or any occasion where they want to stand out.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.
All the work is done, now it's time to cook Ambrosia!
The Grim Reaper could really use a friend. Use friendly interactions to improve your friendship with Grim.\n\n(+35 Event Points)
{0.SimFirstName} is feeling better about the upcoming time traveling experience!\n\nStay away from butterflies and everything should be fine!
Research Ambrosia on your Phone, a Tablet, or a Computer
Successfully use a Romantic interaction on another Sim. Sims who are young adults or older can only romance other Sims who are young adults or older.
{0.SimFirstName} does not seem to be enjoying this song. Should {0.SimPronounSubjective} decide {0.SimPronounSubjective} Dislikes Carnival Beats Music?
Tallest and Widest Prairie-Style Entry Frame
Whether you're practicing your Mixology skills or just serving up juice for your friends, you can save space without compromising on quality with the Compact Bar.
Cook a Meal or Have a Quick Meal

{1.SimFirstName} has reconsidered {1.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} Romantic Boundaries after discussing with {0.SimFirstName}.\n\n{1.SimFirstName} will feel jealous from partners doing physical romance (excluding {T0.Mess Around}{DAE0.WooHoo}).

Dress the next generation of trendsetters in fashion fit for a playdate with The Sims™ 4 First Fits Kit! Whether a child Sim wants to turn heads on the first day of school or run around having fun with friends, these versatile styles will keep them looking fashionable (and SO cute). Kit Features:
  • Dressed to Express — A lifetime of fashion choices starts when you become a big kid and can dress yourself. Give child Sims more ways to express themselves with the kinds of leopard-print jackets, patterned leggings, and colorful shades they’ll want to wear when they grow up.
  • Fashion is 24/7 — Dress child Sims in trendy looks that are fit for birthday parties, the classroom, or just hanging out with friends. These casual looks don’t require a special occasion, but they won’t be out of place at one either.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.
Romantic Boundaries control the factors that make Sims become Jealous and if their Jealousy triggers can change!
Press W/A/S/D or Hold Left-Click and move your mouse to move your camera.\n\nHold Right-Click to rotate your camera.
If someone is actually taking items from previous Sims games, I have to wonder why.
Zap! Vroom! Dag Dag! {0.SimFirstName} demolished the competition in a display of virtual mastery. No one will be calling {M0.him}{F0.her} a n00b anytime soon.

These are your main tools in build mode! From left to right they are: Select (H) - Make an object or element active. Eyedropper (E) - Copy an object. Design Tool (R) - Change object's color. Sledgehammer (K) - Remove an element or object.

To share one of your own creations, select the Save Household button in Create a Sim or Save to My Library button in Build Mode.\n\nThis will open a window in which you can enter a description of your creation and either Save to My Library or Share to the Gallery.

Body hair comes in four categories; Arm, Torso, Back, and Leg Hair. You can find them by selecting your Sim’s body, and then the Body button. You can select one option in each category, and can select a unique color for each if you wish.
{0.SimFirstName} made the other Sim believe in {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} crazy story!

For use of Python

Copyright © 1995-2000 Corporation for National Research Initiatives. All rights reserved. 
Copyright © 1991-1995 Stichting Mathematisch Centrum. All rights reserved.

Electronic Upgrade Parts can be obtained in a couple of ways. Repairing a broken electronic object may yield an upgrade part. Be careful, as a fire can easily be the outcome of the unskilled. Or Select Order and then Purchase Upgrade Parts... from a Computer. (+25 Event Points)
Essence milked directly from Cowplants under the most humane conditions imaginable. Sometimes caretakers get eaten though.
At the end of a very close match, {0.SimFirstName} just couldn’t pull it together for the win. Better luck next time!
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Greenhouse Haven Kit
The mold must burn before doing this.
If games are supposed to be fun, why do they make {0.SimFirstName} so mad?

Constructed with the timeless, suburban familiarity of laminated particle board, BlandCo explores the "purely functional" once again with an optimized crib experience for your Infant. Enter crib, sleep, exit crib, right?\n\nNote: this crib can be upgraded to a Toddler Bed.

Farrah, a freelancing digital artist, has just moved to a new town. She doesn't know anyone! Help her explore her new home, meet some people, and throw the best moving-in-party ever! Fingers crossed, she’ll make some life-long friends along the way; maybe she’ll even meet the Sim of her dreams…\n\nYou can find more information about Scenarios in Lessons under the "Live Mode" Category.
Leonardo and Sofia have received the Carefree trait. Their nonchalant approach to life helps them avoid feeling stressed out and being in tense moods.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Horse Ranch
New game! New world with dragons!

This week, the Death Flower should be just within reach.\n\nWhile you're waiting for it to grow, make sure you continue working on your Cooking and Gourmet Cooking skills! They will come in handy when you're eventually ready to cook Ambrosia.
<font color= '#199C2C'>From the Blast from the Past Event</font>\n\nBlonde hair, blue eyes, kind of a neatnik. Last seen near the pool. His wife anxiously awaits his return but has offered no reward.

The game has three different Camera Styles: The default The Sims 4 Camera, The Sims 3 Camera, and Free Camera.\n\nYou can change the Camera Style in the Camera Controls menu, or the Game Camera section of the Game Options (in The Sims 3 Camera, you also can invert the camera rotation).

{0.SimFirstName} is a Sensitive Infant. These infants are inclined to get diaper rash, be picky with food, and can more easily become overstimulated by too much play and social interaction, however they also rest more peacefully through the night when soothed.

With the time travel component in hand, {0.SimFirstName} is feeling very proud of {0.SimPronounReflexive}. {0.SimPronounSubjective} solved the missing time piece from Nikolais theoretical work!\n\nWhat could be next, other than to activate it?!
Maxis would like to thank Xureila for collaborating with us on Modern Luxe.
Drink this potion to enter the Happy emotion!
This is the current household rule.
Upgrade complete!\n\n{0.SimFirstName} has finished upgrading the alarm clock speaker.
No one can predict {0.SimFirstName} next move!
Find a significant other for each sibling by performing Romantic Interactions with another Sim and asking them to be your romantic partner.
Who would want to do THAT in THERE?!

Build Handiness skill by fixing broken items, upgrading objects such as Sinks or Toilets, or reading books on Handiness. With a skill level of 2 or higher, select Repair on a broken object. (+35 Event Points)
Being with those that mean the most makes the holidays special!
Continue to grow your skills and your garden!
Amazing! You’ve lured in the elusive Angelfish!
A Freezer Boney from beyond our solar system. Its plastic frame shimmers with the vastness of a distant galaxy.
The Grim Reaper looks fairly friendly...Select the Grim Reaper and select an introduction or any social.\n\n(+25 Event Points)
Ah, the sweet sound of silence. Those living with {0.SimFirstName} will never forget the first time {0.SimPronounSubjective} finally slept a full rest without interruption.
Be introverted, avoid coming into close proximity with other Sims, and definitely don't socialize with others for 4 hours.
Maxis would like to thank SIXAMCC for collaborating with us on Storybook Nursery.
Maxis would like to thank Ebonix for collaborating with us on Urban Homage.
Maxis would like to thank lilsimsie for collaborating with us on Comfy Gamer.
{0.SimFirstName} passed down their Collector Trait to {1.SimFirstName}!
Nova needs to rejoin the Tech Guru career to land that desired promotion! To do so, click on the Phone and select Find Job under the Business category.
Build your own fortune, grow your family, and live your life without your grandmother pulling the strings! Maybe this is actually a good thing?
Simoleons are used to purchase new furniture, decorations, and many of the things a Sim will ever need!
Learn or Level Up a Creative Skill

You did it! Great work over these past weeks. You've shared amazing moments with others, created memories, and embraced the holiday spirit from different perspectives. Thank you for documenting experiences. I hope you enjoyed our research, and I can’t wait to collaborate with you again!
Strengthen Grandmother's Connection to the Physical World
The Stay Over being hosted by the {0.String} household will end.

There is a lot to report back to Emit about the time travel experiment and the thief's email. Select Report on Experiment on Emit. Emit can be found at Magnolia Blossom Park, or select the Social category on the Phone to Invite Emit Over. (+35 Event Points)

Fill your collection with colorful new crystals and metals that can be used to create sparkling jewelry. Aspiring jewelers can build up their new skill by using the Gemology Table to cut crystals and get creative with jewelry customization.
{0.SimFirstName} learned about {1.SimFirstName}'s financial status, and {1.SimFirstName} is a little short on funds.
Elevate your Sim's look with makeup! Add some flair to your Sim's face with eyeshadow, eyeliner, blush, lipstick, and face paint to bring out their unique sense of self.

Your Sim can join a Career by using the Business app on their phone, or by opening the Career panel selecting Join a Career.\n\nCareer success depends on different Skills. It’s a good idea to base your choice on your Sim’s current skills, or any Traits that help them build Skills. But with hard work, any Sim can succeed in any Career!
Principal Technical Director, Player & Quality Insights

Nikolai theorized that a time travel component could be built with:

• A piece of Ironyum
• A piece of Plathinum
• A common electronic component

And one other item which must contain the essence of time...but he was unable to discover what held time!
In order to help Emit, you must discover the secrets of time travel if you ever expect to catch the time-traveling thief.

A lifetime of fashion choices starts when you become a big kid and can dress yourself. Give child Sims more ways to express themselves with the kinds of leopard-print jackets, patterned leggings, and colorful shades they’ll want to wear when they grow up.

Now that the Special Time Capsule has been found, it's time to open it! Go to your inventory, find the Special Time Capsule, and select Open. (If you no longer have the Special Time Capsule, it can be replaced at a mailbox) (+15 Event Points)

To change your Sim’s current Outfit, either click on the Sim themselves and choose Outfits > Change Outfits, or interact with a mirror and choose Change Outfits.\n\nTo customize your Sim’s Outfits, interact with a mirror or dresser and choose Change Sim. This will open Create a Sim. When customizing an already existing Sim, you can change things like their clothes and hair, but not sculpt their face and body, or change their Traits.
Guerdon Goods Vending Machine and Athleisure Wear

Children have 4 skills of their very own, called Fundamental Skills. Each Skill can be built upon by interacting with other Sims or objects. Advancing in each of the Fundamental Skills unlocks new ways for Children to interact with the world around them. \n\nChildren may also start developing certain "adult" Skills that are available for Teens and older. However, because they are children, they gain these skills at a slower rate. Like Fundamental Skills, these basic Skills may unlock new ways for Children to interact with the world, but some interactions will require them to age up to Teen before they become available.

Indulge in iconic fashion and enchanting décor with The Sims™ 4 Secret Sanctuary Kit. Create a luxurious space full of opulent furniture concealed behind a secret passage in a bookcase. When you’re inside your hideaway, let the world melt away as you relax on your chaise lounge or try on polished Italian-inspired fashions in your floor-length mirror. Kit Features:
  • An Opulent Oasis – This is a private retreat featuring a mysterious hidden entrance, elegant antique vanity, charming tea set, and more high-end touches sure to delight Sims with a sense of refinement.
  • Flawlessly Fashionable – These finely-tailored Italian-inspired fashions are polished, sophisticated, and feature classic silhouettes. It’s a cohesive collection that feels curated, as if hand-picked by someone with exquisite taste.

  • A Personal Touch – Use the décor in this kit to make your computer area feel homey, relaxing, and completely yours with plants, clutter, and gaming accessories. There are even cubed cubbies for displaying knickknacks and other treasured items that make you happy!

Mămăligă is a cherished traditional dish found in many Eastern European countries, and some hail it as the national dish of Romania. Originally made with millet flour, today it is a polenta crafted from yellow maize flour. It can be prepared to various consistencies, serving as a comforting porridge or a delightful bread substitute.\n\nMămăligă is incredibly versatile and pairs well with cheese and other toppings. Our own recipe includes cottage cheese, tomatoes, and basil. Rich in history and flavor, mămăligă continues to be a staple in Eastern European cuisine, celebrated for its simplicity and adaptability.

In the World Select screen you can see all the Worlds in your game, hover the cursor over each one to learn more about the World, and change World. Changing Worlds will open that World’s Map. In the upper left corner, you can change between Residential and Destination Worlds (if you have any Destination Worlds available). Destination Worlds are Worlds where you can’t live permanently, but you can visit while on Vacation. More Worlds, of both the Residential and Destination type, can be unlocked as you get new Expansion and Game Packs.

Linger as a Ghost, helping or terrorizing the living. Grow abilities, assist with chores, or levitate Sims for fun. Earn Fear or Goodwill essences from interactions. Enjoy afterlife activities, including special spectral WooHoo with another Ghost.

{0.SimFirstName} is a growing Infant, but must rely on Caregivers and other older Sims to help care for {0.SimPronounObjective}. Learn more about Infant Care in the lesson!

Craft dazzling jewelry and give your creations a spark of power with The Sims™ 4 Crystal Creations Stuff Pack! Engage with a new skill that will have your Sim collecting materials and customizing pieces to wear, gift, or sell. These gems don't just look radiant – when charged in the moonlight they can affect Sims' moods, relationships, careers, and lives! Stuff Pack Features:
  • Jewelry By You — Fill your collection with colorful new crystals and metals that can be used to create sparkling jewelry. Aspiring jewelers can build up their new skill by using the Gemology Table to cut crystals and get creative with jewelry customization.
  • All Charged Up — Search out crystals or pluck them off the Crystal Tree and get ready to supercharge! Charged crystals will affect the moods and lives of Sims; the pieces you craft will truly be life changing.
  • Dark and Dreamy — Pair your shining creations with hints of mystery and intrigue. The clothing and furniture in this pack is perfect for a cozy workroom! There's even a set of dreamy jewelry created in collaboration with Simmer Arethabee and available in CAS.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.
Original Music by Ilan Eshkeri and Steve McLaughlin
{0.SimFirstName} is incredibly tired, even if {0.SimPronounSubjective} doesn't show it in the same way as less-calm Infants. {0.SimPronounSubjective|xxUpper} needs to sleep right now.
The water feels great! {0.SimFirstName}'s merfolkian love of the water becomes all the more apparent during bath time.
A simple but effective example of a trabeated entryway. This elevated-height frame depends upon a load-bearing lintel to ensure structural integrity.

Dear {0.SimName},

It is with great pleasure that I bequeath to you the sum of {1.Money}. Your grandfather and I worked tirelessly for many years to amass this wealth, and it gives me great comfort to know that it will be put to good use. Despite the occasional disagreements and moments of tension, I have witnessed your capacity for kindness, determination, and hard work. I am proud of the person you have become, {0.SimFirstName}, and I trust that you will use this money to continue to contribute positively to our family and society as a whole.

With love and best wishes,

Grandmother

You can add more Sims to this household! Create up to 8 Sims with different relationships, such as: parents, children, siblings, roommates or spouses.
Do you know what goes well with traditional foods? Traditional drinks! Let's make some of both to test my theory.

Embrace vibrant colors and mid-century modern design with The Sims™ 4 Cozy Kitsch Kit. Inspired by the 60s and the 70s, this collection of living room items features bold color and pattern combinations, stylish surfaces, and cute décor with delightful character. Add subtle accents to your room, or make a statement with every piece. Created by myshunosun. Kit Features:
  • Play With Color – Show off trinkets on a chic faux fireplace, tune your vintage radio to your beloved station, and cozy up on your favorite corduroy sofa.
  • Make A Statement – Decorate your room with bold artwork and a daring neon sign. Combine sleek mid-century surfaces with unique heirloom finds.

Ghost Sims can be customized to wear any regular outfits available for living Sims, in addition to those exclusive to Ghosts! From casual wear to formal, the choice is yours to give your Ghost Sim a unique and personalized look that reflects their otherworldly style.
Each Sim has grown a new trait to reflect their personality growth!
Nova stayed in her lane, ignored the haters and worked hard to succeed. Fulfilling her dream of exploring other worlds will have to wait, for now she only wants to explore career options!
Having discovered the secret element of time travel, Emit has challenged you to become a time traveler as well!\n\nContinue this quest to find out how to build a time travel component.

A city for the romantics, Ciudad Enamorada is well known for its ample opportunities for romantic getaways and scandalous trysts. Whether head over heels or still looking for love, this city provides passionate moments for each. An aspiring romantic can explore Vista Hermosa for the warm and welcoming suburban life, the lush and picturesque Plaza Mariposa for walking hand in hand at sunset, or the traditional meets modern Nuevo Corazón for those seeking the alluring temptation of the nightlife.

Bring the neighbors together – literally – and experience multi-family lots as a tenant or property owner in The Sims™ 4 For Rent Expansion Pack! Your Sim can now own and manage multiple Residential Rental lots or move into a home where they’re closer to their neighbors than ever (perfect for snooping!). Falling in love, having children, and spending time with relatives can be a very meaningful part of your Sim’s life! If you want some help to shape your Sim’s personality and backstory, you can Add Sim via a Story. By answering some multiple choice questions, a custom Sim will be made for you. \n\nThe Sim’s Traits and Aspiration will be fixed, and they might get some starting Skills, Career Levels, and extra Starting Funds. You can customize their appearance, name, and gender.

Last but not least, let your creative juices flow in Build Mode. Play around with the tools and explore the Object catalog to discover the depth of possibility this game mode has to offer. Recreating a building you’ve visited or lived in, or a floorplan you found online, can be a fun challenge. You could also research different architectural and interior design styles, and create your own interpretations! Leave reality behind and pull your inspiration from fairy tales and science fiction; who wouldn’t love to live in a giant mushroom or spaceship?

This wicker bassinet is just like your Newborn: soft, cute, and...eco-friendly?\nWait...are babies eco-friendly? It's something to consider. I mean, with all that "silent but deadly" methane gas they emit. And the diapers do add up over time. What about all those pacifiers and teething toys dropped on the sidewalk, eventually seeping plastic into the water supply! Much to consider...\nBut anyways, soft and cute! Yeah!

Nova can proudly close the first chapter of her career. She’s now very much her own boss and launched her very own company, built on her very own ideals. Will she find new nemeses or form strong alliances? And will she end up giving up on her dream to go to space? It’s up to you to decide!

A great Build Mode cheat is bb.moveObjects on. This allows you to place items in locations that would otherwise be invalid! Be aware that some Objects might not work as intended when placed at an invalid location, but it works great for things like lush gardens and cluttered corners.\n\nbb.ignoreGameplayUnlocksEntitlement can be used to unlock otherwise locked Objects in the Build catalog, such as Career rewards.

San Sequoia began as a small fishing town, then became a hub of the fishing and canning industry due to the influence of local fisherman-turned-entrepreneur, Bayani Robles. The Robles family is still very much entrenched in the area even as it has expanded over time thanks to Gilbert Gilberts. Today, San Sequoia is home to cozy streets, a beautiful park with gardens, and quiet suburban neighborhoods. It's the perfect place to raise a family!
This retro console brings the nostalgia and comes with cartridge and disc capabilities and with support for up to two players for that cozy night in playing games.

To pan (move around) the camera, hold the scroll wheel (TS4 Camera) or the right mouse button (TS3 Camera) and move the mouse, or use the arrows or [W], [A], [S], and [D] keys on the keyboard. To rotate the camera, hold the right mouse button (TS4 Camera) or the scroll wheel (TS3 camera) and move the mouse. You can only tilt the camera vertically with the Sims 3 Camera Style. Zoom in and out using the mouse scroll wheel or the [+] and [-] keys on the keyboard.

Grown from humble roots off the coast of Shih Sea, Tomarang is lively with local fare, community chaos, and legends of lore. Known for its tight-knit communities and sun-filled shared spaces, Tomarang is a lush landscape of possibilities. Come cozy up with nature or fish around for neighborly niceties and whim-simsical secrets. Whether you're flying solo or raising generations, this region offers a warm welcome to any multi-living lifestyle! Sul Sul De-Kah!

Sims need Skills to pay the bills! Skills are essential for advancing in Careers and can also help your Sims earn some extra Simoleons on the side. Skills have other benefits as well; as your Sims improve their Skills, they will unlock new interactions, craft unique objects, get better at building relationships, and so much more. So what are you waiting for? Buy a Skill Book from the bookshelf, or a Skill building Object from the Build Mode catalog, and get started!

Wants are a great way to earn Satisfaction Points!

Wants can be viewed on the bottom left above your Sim's head. Hover over the bubble to see more details!

If you don't see any Wants, open your Game Options and make sure Show Wants & Fears is enabled under Gameplay.

When going on Vacation, a Sim can choose to Vacation in any Residential World that contains a Vacation Rental venue lot. With certain expansions, they may also visit a Destination World instead. These are worlds that Sims may only vacation in and may not use as a residence.\n\nAfter selecting a world, choose a Vacation Rental lot for the selected Sim(s) to live in throughout the duration of the vacation.
To achieve everything, Nova has had very little sleep. That earned her the reward trait Seldom Sleepy, that greatly slows the decay rate of the Energy meter, allowing Nova to stay awake longer.

They say the best way to defeat an enemy is to make them your friend. Nova went a bit further than that and made Lewis a part of her household. The day may come when she questions her decision to live with an insufferable know-it-all, but today, she's happy to have regained a long lost friendship.
Read the inheritance letter from a sibling's inventory to see what they have - and have not - been given!

Explore the Ghost Mastery panel to track progress, stamina, and access the perks panel. Ghost Mastery is categorized into Evil, Neutral, and Good, shaping the type of ghost a Sim can become. Hover over each ability in the perks panel to learn more.

Ghosts use stamina when performing abilities. As stamina depletes, ghosts will appear more faded, which can be monitored using the stamina meter.

The Eyedropper tool is used to copy an existing Object or architectural feature, or a Wall, Floor, or Roof Pattern. Click on the thing you want to copy, and either place the new Object or feature, or apply the Pattern to a surface, as you would if you grabbed it from the Catalog. Using the Eyedropper on an Object, feature, or Pattern will open its Category in the Build Catalog.

Practice makes perfect! Interact with special Skill Objects or other Sims to raise Skill levels. If your Sim is Happy, or is in the Skill’s associated Emotion, they will raise it faster. When they’re building a Skill, the bar over your Sim’s head shows you their progress towards the next Skill level. You can also keep track of your Sim’s Skills in the Skill panel. For more information about specific Skills, check out the Lessons in the Skills section of the Live Mode category.

In Native American tradition, "the three sisters" are corn, beans, and squash. They grow best together in the same plot. The eldest sister, corn, provides a strong foundation for the beans to climb. The beans enrich the soil with nitrogen. The youngest sister, squash, covers the ground, protecting all of their roots.

Strengthen family bonds, make friends or enemies, and discover your Sims’ truest selves with The Sims™ 4 Growing Together Expansion Pack*! The ways your Sims relate to those around them – from family members to Sims they’ve just met – are evolving. Both planned events like sleepovers and unexpected milestones like having a midlife crisis will shape your Sims and their relationships. Expansion Pack Features:

Capture your best (or worst) Sims moments with screenshots and videos! In Live Mode, in the Camera Options, you can access buttons to take a screenshot, start and stop recording a video, and open the Screenshot Capture Manager. You can also take screenshots with the [C] key and record videos with the [V] key on your keyboard. These shortcuts allow you to take screenshots in Create a Sim, and take screenshots and videos in Build Mode. Check out the Camera Control Lessons to learn more about how to control the Game Camera so you can line up the perfect shot!

Sometimes Sims just click. Your Sim might have natural social chemistry with a Sim they meet at a party – or they might naturally clash. Your Sim will now have preferences that determine which Sims they are socially compatible with, and which Sims are more likely to become their enemies.

There is a big world waiting for your Sim outside of their home Lot! In addition to a change in scenery, traveling has many perks. As your Sims visit new places, they’ll encounter new Sims, Collectibles, and experiences. Why not order a drink at the Bar or get some help with their exercise from the trainer at the Gym? Before your Sims can afford more expensive Objects, they can visit a Venue and use them for free. For example, computers can be found at the Library.

Give your Sims more ways to express their creativity. There’s a new easel, tablet, and woodworking table for Sims to use in their artistic endeavors. Place inspiring still-life references, a backdrop, and other props to really help your creativity flow.

Alas, my time is drawing short. When you've lived as long as I have, you can feel it coming. Don't mourn me, I am going home to be with your grandfather, and I will be watching from above. My one regret in life is that I never pushed you three to your full potential. We have spoiled you, and this is more my fault than yours. So, I hope you understand, when I do this, I am truly trying to do what is best for the three of you, so that you might be pushed to achieve your own goals. I have done my best to leave you with what I think you will need to succeed in the long run.

Crafting objects is another great way to earn Simoleons!

Impress guests with a modern entertainment space and suave fits from The Sims™ 4 Casanova Cave Kit. This laid-back masculine fashion will have Sims looking confident, and the contemporary style of your den’s décor – a stylish bar, sleek coffee table, and more – will guarantee the right atmosphere, whether it’s game night or date night. Kit Features:
  • Elevated Evenings – A jumbo, state-of-the-art TV and stylish modern furniture will make your den an undeniable hotspot. Have friends over for a chill night at the card table – or have a date over for an exciting night on your stylish, well-loved leather sofa.
  • Effortless Style – Dress in high-quality, understated fashions made for the masculine Sim. These styles are relaxed, achieving a polished look that is still a bit rough around the edges.

There is also information on Skills located in the Skills panel at the bottom right. This can be accessed by clicking on the Lightbulb Icon or pressing the [L] shortcut. Progress across all Skills is easily visible in this panel, and the right column indicates current Skill Level. Hovering over a Skill Icon or Name also gives additional information about that skill and what objects allow your Sim to gain it.\n\nWhen a Skill (or multiple Skills) are actively being gained the affected Skill(s) will glow to indicate active progress.

To try out some hats, piercings, glasses, and necklaces, select your Sim’s head. Select Hats to show all hats, or use the subcategories to browse a more specific selection. Within each of the main categories of the pie menu, such as Friendly or Mean, there are now a collection of subcategories present to sort interactions. Each subcategory will further classify the interactions your Sims can perform on each other, making it easier for you to find that specific Joke you wanted to tell, or Argument you wanted to start.\n\nUniquely important interactions, such as Proposals or Divorces, can still be found outside of subcategories.

A Sim’s Gender can be set in the Identity panel. If the Sim is a Teen or older, you can further customize their Gender by selecting the Customize button below the Gender buttons and opening the Gender tab.\n\nIn this menu, you can select your Sim’s Physical Frame (their basic body shape); their Clothing Preference (this determines the preset filter when editing Outfits, but you can always remove these filters); whether your Sim can become pregnant, get others pregnant, or neither; and if your Sim can use the toilet standing up or not.

Rooms are the most basic components of a building. A Room is a space usually enclosed by Walls, but it could also be enclosed by Fences (like a porch or balcony) or nothing at all.\n\nYou can find all the tools to create Rooms and Walls in the Walls and Empty Rooms catalog.

You don't venture into the lion's den with the expectation of coming out unscathed. Sometimes death is the only logical ending for some actions.

This is a private retreat featuring a mysterious hidden entrance, elegant antique vanity, charming tea set, and more high-end touches sure to delight Sims with a sense of refinement.

Wants are a great way to earn Satisfaction Points for the Potion of Youth! Wants can be viewed on the bottom left above your Sim's head. Hover over the bubble to see more details! If you don't see any Wants, open your Game Options and make sure Show Wants & Fears is enabled under Gameplay. (+45 Event Points)

Is your soul ready to embrace the next chapter? By choosing to Rebirth, you will set forth on a new journey as a new Sim, leaving your current life behind with no chance of return. You will be taken to Manage Worlds to select the household where your new life will unfold and will have the opportunity to fully customize your reborn self in Create a Sim. While funds, relationships, and achievements from this life will be lost, if you have already unlocked the coveted Burning Soul trait, you’ll be able to retain one personality trait with the Recall Past Life self-interaction, along with certain others using the Peer Into Soul interaction available on mirrors. If you choose to Rebirth as a younger Sim, certain developmental skills will be immediately unlocked! Now the threads of fate lie before you. The choice to weave a new destiny can be made when you are ready. Will you choose to Rebirth now?
Maybe if you smear your siblings reputation enough, your grandmother will look more favorably upon you?
Hmmm... {0.SimFirstName} was unsure about {1.ObjectName}. Maybe this food will need to be explored again.
If this is the starter home for you, click confirm!\n\nDon't worry though, you can always move to a new home later!

It just so happens that the next ingredient is my favorite flower: The Death Flower!\n\nComplete the quests Death's Favorite Flower and Flirting with Death. It’s time for you to nurture a Death Flower to life!
Design an inspiring space for Sims to hone their creative skills with The Sims™ 4 Artist Studio Kit.

With that Grimophone, you can summon me whenever you need. Just don't don't do it too often. Traveling to this realm can be exhausting.

When two ambitious Sims combine forces, they can achieve great things. Encourage Nova and Lewis to grow their new-found relationship and support each other... or let them fall back into their old, bickering ways. Whatever you choose, with a pair like Nova and Lewis, drama will surely follow.

This antique music box features a tiny Grim Reaper figurine and plays a haunting lullaby, merging timeless elegance with the allure of the macabre. As an heirloom, this would withstand the test of time.
Find this item in Build Mode under Electronics, or use the Event Rewards filter.

As odd as it may seem, Emit believes that the time travel component infused computer can send an email to the thief, whenever they may be, to get some answers as to why the theft. Select Send Time Traveling Email on a Computer. (+35 Event Points)

A Sim’s Aspiration is what they aspire to be, do, and experience! In Live Mode, this is represented by the Aspiration Goals in the Aspiration panel. These can help you set the course of your Sim’s life!

In Create a Sim, you now have the option to create a Ghost! Next to the Aspiration trait icon, you'll find a new molecule that lets you choose from various death types. To revert your Sim back to a living state, simply select the 'X' on the cause of death icon. Please note that Toddler and Infant Sims cannot become Ghosts, and certain death types are restricted to specific age groups.
If you wish to damage Nova's relationship with Lewis, select Criticize Woohoo Techniques under the Mean category. This interaction is unlocked by performing Mean socials.

The Sim with the most points at the end of the game wins. And hey, that's you!

You can save your creations to your Library for future use, or save and share to the Gallery, so other players can download them! To save or share a Household from Create a Sim, select the Save Household button. To save or share a Room or Lot from Build Mode, select the Save to My Library in the toolbar, and then either Save Lot or Save Room. A Room must be selected with the Select tool for this option to be available.

Explore options for Romance through Cupid's Corner. This Matchmaking app gives you a selection of Sims to meet that are available for a romantic relationship.\n\nSims will be pulled from the Gallery unless this option is disabled in the Pack Settings.

In the Lessons library you’ll find information about everything from how to customize unique Sims and mastering the build tools to how you make your Sims rich and happy (or poor and miserable, if that’s your style.) To change your Sim’s skin tone, select their body, press the Body button, and then press the Skin Tone button. This button is also available in the Face menu. There’s a wide range of Skin Tones divided into four categories; Warm, Neutral, Cool, and Miscellaneous. Once you’ve selected a skin tone, you can further adjust it by pulling the slider. You can also save a customized skin tone by pressing the Save button.

A Sim’s Emotion is based on their current Moodlets. Each Moodlet has a different strength, duration, and associated Emotion. The main source of Moodlets are your Sim’s Needs, Traits, and recent experiences. You can see your Sim’s current Emotion and their Moodlets by their portrait. Hover the cursor over the Sim or a Moodlet to learn more!

Dear {0.SimName},

I leave to you the sum of {1.Money} as a reminder of the hard work and dedication that your grandfather and I put into amassing our wealth. However, I have concerns that if I left too much to you and your siblings, it may only serve to encourage your reckless behavior. This small sum is meant to help you stay afloat, but it is also a reminder that you must take responsibility for your own success.

I implore you to cherish your siblings and work together to establish a legacy of your own. Do not rely solely on the wealth that has been left to you, but use it wisely and in a way that benefits both yourself and your family. It is time to grow up and prove yourself as a responsible and productive member of society.

With cautious optimism for your future,

Grandmother

There are two ways to download a creation to your game. If you want to use the creation immediately, select the Place button in the lower right corner. If you’re downloading a Household, this will add its Sims to your current Household. If you’re downloading a Lot or a Room, these will be placed on your current Lot. You can also add a creation to your Library by selecting the Save to My Library button in the lower left corner. This allows you to access the creation from the My Library tab at a later time.

Reflecting on our newly researched Holiday traditions

- Jasmine Holiday

Mucenici is a traditional Romanian pastry prepared for the Christian feast of the 40 Martyrs of Sebaste on March 9th. They are created by rolling and shaping dough into figure eights, which represents eternity and remembrance of the soldiers who were persecuted. The pastries embody the cultural heritage of those who observe the day and celebrate culinary tradition, bringing families together to honor the past and welcome spring.\n\nThe preparation method of mucenici varies depending on the region. In Moldova, the famous Moldavian mucenici are made from sweet bread dough. They are baked in the oven, then coated with honey and sprinkled with walnuts. In Muntenia, Oltenia, and Dobrogea, the dough for mucenici is much simpler, with only three ingredients. These are boiled in water with sugar, walnuts, and cinnamon—the water symbolizing the lake where the soldiers were thrown. Although the preparation method differs, their shape has remained unchanged—the figure 8. The enjoyment of mucenici is a communal activity that strengthens family bonds and cultural identity, making it a cherished part of Romanian heritage.

Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit! Blend simple and psychedelic with quirky pastel prints, irregular shapes, and vintage vibes. This collection is perfect for your Sim’s dorm, bedroom, or studio apartment. Kit Features:
  • Avant Basic — Decorating should be fun and carefree! Give your room a quirky side with irregular, but simple, shapes in dreamy pastel colors. This collection has heart chairs, mirrors shaped like puddles, and even more ways to incorporate whimsy into everyday design.
  • Blast From the Past — Create a contemporary space that draws inspiration from times gone by. The patterned bed sheets and psychedelically curved table legs in this kit are nostalgic for summertime in the 60s and 70s, but they still fit right in with modern, understated, décor.

Follow your Sims from the cradle to the grave. As time goes on, Sims will age and go through seven Life Stages; Baby, Toddler, Child, Teenager, Young Adult, Adult, and Elder; each with their unique experiences and challenges. After a long and eventful life (or a shorter one, if your Sim has an accident), all Sims must face the Grim Reaper—unless they’ve found a way to cheat death… Death doesn’t have to be the end. Keep the remains of your late relatives around, and you might have a nightly visitor!

<font color= '#199C2C'>From the Blast from the Past Event</font>

Remember tangled chords, rotary dials, and tapping the receiver for a dial tone? The Retro-Deco Table Phone aims to bring you right back to that ancient era of pre-digital communications.

Experience the memories of when busy signals were an everyday occurrence, the answering machine was still just a twinkle in the eye of a would be inventor, and call waiting meant waiting for your sibling to get off the phone so you could make a call.
Nothing prepares your guests for the Cozy Celebrations like the Festive Feeling Welcome Mat. Just make sure your guests use it before entering, no one likes cleaning muddy footprints.

Your Sim has more hair than what’s on the top of their head! You can also customize eyebrows, facial hair, and body hair. \n\nYou can select a unique color for all these hair categories, or check the Match Hair checkbox to match the color of the hair on your Sim’s head.

Milestones are a collection of your Sims' experiences. Try achieving as many as you can!

Relationships between Sims of different ages will now face different advantages and challenges. Sims will gain or lose relationship at different speeds depending on both the types of interaction and the age of the other Sim.\n\nFor example, Child Sims will become friends much faster with other Child Sims, since they understand each other so well. But a Child Sim will find it a bit more difficult to raise their relationship with a Teen or Young Adult Sim, who might take the Child less seriously than their peers. Adult Sims will struggle to raise their relationship with Teen Sims, as Teens will often see them as uncool. But Adult Sims will have a much easier time befriending Elders.

What about all those pacifiers and teething toys dropped on the sidewalk, eventually seeping plastic into the water supply! Much to consider...\nBut anyways, soft and cute! Yeah!

If a Sim is exploring Romantic Boundaries, they may Reconsider if asked by another Sim. Select another Sim, choose the “Relationship” category, then choose the "Change Relationship" subcategory. Find the "Ask To Reconsider Romantic Boundaries" category. In this category there are social interactions that Sims can use to ask another Sim to Reconsider specific Romantic Boundaries. If a Sim is not Exploring Romantic Boundaries they cannot be asked to Reconsider. Learn more about setting up your Sims' Romantic Boundaries in Lessons under Create A Sim > Identity & Personality > Romantic Boundaries

The world is full of things to discover! Explore each Neighborhood and experience what they have to offer. Why not show off your discoveries at home with shelves filled with fossils, aquariums with rare fish, or a flourishing garden with rare (perhaps even supernatural) plants? Some secrets exist outside the edges of the World Map. If you were to encounter a strange tree or an old mine entrance, perhaps you should take a closer look…

Fundamentals are similar to Skills but specific to Toddlers and Children. Interact with special Skill Objects or other Sims to raise these Fundamental levels and unlock new ways to interact with the world around your growing Sims.\n\nThe bar over your Sim's head shows you their progress towards the next Fundamental or Skill level and progress can be tracked in this panel.

In The Sims 4, there are several Worlds to inhabit and explore. They each have their own charm and advantages.\n\nWorlds are made up of Neighborhoods, and in Neighborhoods you find Lots. Lots can be Residential Lots where Sims live, or public Venues to visit.

Here are some other useful Objects! A trash can, sink, and fire alarm will help your Sims keep their home clean and safe. Dining or Desk Chairs are required to use Objects such as Desks and Chess Tables. Make sure the Chair snaps to the Table when you place it! Lights will make it easier to see at night and nice Decorations will give your Sims Happy Moodlets.

Coordinate your décor to build the perfect party atmosphere with The Sims™ 4 Party Essentials Kit. Set the mood with matching decorations that come in swatches perfect for any party you want to throw, plus a disco ball to add some sparkle, and a fog machine to add some mystery. Kit Features:
  • Celebrate Anything — These decorations don’t just fade into the background – not even the backdrops! Coordinate with matching pieces or mix and match to create the perfect mood for any occasion.
  • Every Day’s a Party – This kit has all the essentials your Sims need to share some good times. Throw a birthday party, a big bash complete with a disco ball, or a chill hangout session with friends.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum requirements for the pack.

Strengthen family bonds, make friends or enemies, and discover your Sims’ truest selves with The Sims™ 4 Growing Together Expansion Pack*! The ways your Sims relate to those around them – from family members to Sims they’ve just met – are evolving. Grow your culinary skills with new small appliances and turn cooking into cash with The Sims™ 4 Home Chef Hustle Stuff Pack! Design an efficient kitchen with all the tools you need to become a masterful home chef. Sims will look the part in stylish aprons and other kitchen accessories, and amateur chefs can even turn cooking into a lucrative side hustle with their own food stands. Pack Features:
  • Small Appliances, Big Upgrade — Outfit your kitchen with small appliances like a stand mixer, waffle maker, or countertop pizza oven to expand your culinary horizons. As Sims upgrade their skills, they’ll be able to do more with these new appliances and discover more delicious recipes.
  • Feed the Neighborhood — Turn your love of cooking into a side hustle! Sims can open their own small business with the new food stand and sell tasty treats and mouthwatering meals to neighbors. Stands can be named and customized to reflect your Sim and the kind of food they choose to serve.
  • Fresh Chef Styles — Your cooking adventure wouldn’t be complete without the right fashion. Kitchen-ready hairstyles, food themed accessories, and aprons for the whole family will have your Sims looking like serious amateur chefs.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.

To customize your Sim’s personality, select a Pick a Trait button and pick Traits until all Trait slots are filled. These Traits affect everything in the game from Emotions and Skills to Hobbies and Relationships. Some Traits can't be paired with other Traits. For example, you can't be both Good and Evil. Some traits may be more challenging to play with, but they will provide unique opportunities for your Sims!

Romantic Boundaries control what does or doesn't make Sims experience romantic Jealousy. By default, all Sims experience Jealousy if a partner engages in any kind of romance with other Sims. You can change this! Romantic Boundaries can be configured in the Identity Panel in Create A Sim. The first three settings control if your Sim experiences Jealousy when a partner engages in certain types of romantic interactions with other Sims. The settings are:
  • Non-physical romance, which is any romance where the Sims' bodies do not touch. These can be found in the Affection and Flirtation categories of the Romance interaction menu when you select another Sim.
  • Physical romance, under the Physical Intimacy category of the Romance interaction menu. This setting controls Jealousy caused by a partner having romantic physical contact, but does not include Mess Around (Teen Sims) or WooHoo (Adult Sims.)
  • The third setting specifically covers Mess Around (for Teen Sims) or WooHoo (for Adult Sims.) These interactions are also found in the Physical Intimacy category.

There are many ways to create a new Room. Click and drag with the Wall Tool to place a Wall. Walls can be placed along the grid, or diagonally. Once you have enclosed a space in Walls, it becomes a Room. To create a rectangular Room in one click and drag motion, hold down [Shift] on the keyboard while using the Wall Tool, or use the Room Tool. The total cost of the Room is displayed above the cursor.

Change the color of the Objects on your lot with the Design Tool! Clicking on an Object with this tool will bring up a menu of colors, or swatches. Some swatches have unique patterns.\n\nUsing the Design Tool doesn’t cost any Simoleons!

You can move, resize, and rotate an existing Room by selecting it with the Select tool and clicking the Buttons that appear. You can also rotate a Room by moving it and using the [<] and [>] keys on the keyboard.\n\nThis will also display the Wall Height options. All Walls on the same Floor will have the same Wall Height. Certain structures such as Windows and Friezes may have a minimum Wall Height. They will be removed if the Wall Height is shortened to below that minimum.

You can modify the Lifespan of Sims, and which Sims age and which don’t. Open the Game Menu, select Game Options, and navigate to the Gameplay tab. Auto aging is on by default for Played Sims. This includes your current active Household and other Households you have played previously. If you want your active Household to age, but not your other Households, select Only Active Household in the Auto Age (Played Households) setting.

Adding a new Vacation Rental lot to any world is easy! Travel to any lot that does not have a Household already occupying it. Once in Build Mode, on the upper left hand side of the screen, select the Venue Info icon. From there, the venue can be changed to “Vacation Rental” from the Lot Type drop down. This lot is now a Vacation Rental Lot. While in Build Mode, be sure to place any objects you’d like to have available to future vacationers.

A Sim’s Aspiration is what they aspire to be, do, and experience! Sims will be given goals based on their Aspiration that can be completed for rewards. Select the Pick an Aspiration button to pick your first Aspiration. Most Aspiration categories have multiple options. For instance, click on Food and choose between Master Chef and Master Mixologist! Your first Aspiration will also give your Sim a Bonus Trait that you can see next to your selected Aspiration!

To find Ironyum, search for rocks or dirt mounds ready to be dug up. Look closely for when they appear, or speed up the process of rock formation by using Ultra Speed from the time controls. Create a place for Sims to enjoy some quality plant time with The Sims™ 4 Greenhouse Haven Kit. Whether they love taking in serene greenery or organizing the perfect planting workspace, use paned windows and doors to construct a bright and tranquil retreat for your Sims to delight in. Kit Features:
  • A Room to Grow — This kit includes build items designed for creating the perfect greenhouse structure. Craft an ideal windowed haven for your Sims to indulge their green thumbs and live out their gardening fantasies.
  • Signs of Life – Even the most organized gardeners need tools. Pots, plant starters, gloves, and spray bottles will make your greenhouse look like a space your Sim loves to spend time in.

To build a time travel component, first make sure you have: • Level 2 in both Handiness and Logic • A piece of Ironyum and Plathinum • An Electronic Upgrade Part • A Shard of Time If any of the components are missing, select Replace on a Mailbox to recover the needed parts. From your inventory, select Build Time Travel Component on a Shard of Time. (+15 Event Points)

Things always get a little spooky in Ravenwood. The Whispering Glen with its nightly Moon Revelry festivities is perhaps the most "normal" part of the area, where locals have settled down for a slice of quiet, country life. Crow's Crossing village, however, is clearly quite haunted—swings swaying by themselves, that Merchant fellow down by the Crypt, scary little Edith guarding the Well of Longing and Regret…but despite the hauntings, the living have certainly made it their home as well with a variety of festivals and places to explore. Mourningvale is where things get extra ethereal! It's well known as a home for Ghosts and those seeking them. Sometimes Grim even stops by!

You’ll find the options for moving in the Cell Phone’s Travel app. Use the Move Household option to move the entire Household to a new Lot, or Split from Household and Move option to move parts of the Household to a new Lot. The Split option opens a new menu. Here you can decide which Sims will move out and how much money they will bring with them. You can press the Select another Household button to move them into another Household.

Explore nonconforming styles and make them your own with The Sims™ 4 Grunge Revival Kit. Whether it’s rocking an old band tee or a baggy hoodie from the thrift store, this kit is all about bringing new energy and bold intention to everyday looks. Kit Features:
  • It’s in the Fit — Whether these clothes were found or passed down, these slouchy silhouettes and faded jeans are now yours to make new with styles for every frame.
  • Embrace the Unpolished — Challenge expectations with a wardrobe that's all about experimenting with effortless, confident fits.
Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.

While Sims are still growing up, they experience many “firsts”. Infants are entirely reliant on their caregivers to ensure their basic needs are met. Giving them lots of attention will help them in these early formative days. Toddlers are still largely dependent on their caregivers, and will need help learning things like how to walk and talk. Child Sims take on some more advanced Skills, have their first Aspiration, and start School. School continues as Sims become Teens. Now they can get a Part-Time Job and begin to explore their romantic interests, too!

Explore romance as you match with alluring Sims and plan exciting dates in The Sims™ 4 Lovestruck Expansion Pack. Create your Sim’s profile for the Cupid’s Corner dating app and start meeting matches! New intimate interactions like cuddling in bed or meeting for a seductive dance are waiting. Whether your Romance Dynamic ends up steamy or strained will depend on what your Sim finds attractive. Pay special attention to those Turn-Ons and Turn-Offs! Heartbreak Happens Digital Content:
  • Basic Breakup Double Bed
  • Herbert Heart
  • Cry Me a River Eyeliner
Romance isn’t all butterflies and rainbows, as the song so wisely says. Sometimes love hurts. With the Heartbreak Happens bundle, embrace your Sims’ heartbreak and get them ready to get back on the scene. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Plan hotter dates
  • Match with single Sims on Cupid's Corner
  • Strong Attraction with Turn-Ons and Turn-Offs
  • Level up your Romance Skill

Surround new additions to the family with the elegance they deserve in The Sims™ 4 Storybook Nursery Kit. This nursery is a refined space that instills a sense of sophistication, featuring ornate furniture as well as whimsical toys. Made in collaboration with creator SixamCC, this collection balances the joy of a new arrival with elevated charm. Some items even pay homage to the lore and legacy of The Sims. Kit Features:
  • A Touch of Whimsy – Inspired by classic fairy tales and the elegance of ages past, this collection features delicately crafted toys, pleasant wallpaper, a dreamy mobile, and a dollhouse modeled after the traditional home of an old, prominent family.
  • A Legacy of Elegance – Raise your little one among ornate furniture including shelves and a changing table. Some of these items, like the crib with the sweeping canopy and the tasteful chandelier, may have been passed down through the generations.

Sims can develop a multitude of different Skills, which give your Sims all sorts of different benefits! Interact with special Skill Objects or other Sims to raise Skill levels. If your Sim is happy or in the Skill's associated emotion they will raise skill faster. 

The bar over your Sim's head shows you their progress towards the next Skill level that they are actively learning, and progress towards all skills can be tracked in this panel.

This community formed when several groups embraced their mutual connection to Horses and the land. The area soon became known as a hub for all things Equestrian: a town steeped in expertise with raising and training Horses, set against a beautiful and expansive landscape. Over time, the area became famous for another endeavor, as the rich soil brought in the new enterprise of Nectar Making. Thanks to the hard work of everyone involved, the region flourished and became the Chestnut Ridge it is today.

I'll visit you soon!

Craft spaces that look loved and lived-in with The Sims™ 4 Everyday Clutter Kit*! Tell the stories of your Sims’ personalities through scattered items related to their hobbies and daily lives like used coffee cups, stacked magazines, or beauty supplies. Kit Features:
  • It’s Personal — A cell phone case in your Sim’s favorite color, a stack of books and games placed off to the side in their living room, a creative display of pictures – this collection includes tons of small, personal, touches that will make your Sim’s house feel more like home.
  • Show to Tell — Scattering used coffee cups to show your Sim is a big fan of caffeine or adding makeup and jewelry boxes to the top of their dresser for a hint at their morning routine are just a couple examples of the visual storytelling this kit empowers.

Time goes by, hour by hour, day by day. But in Live Mode, you have the power to control it! At the bottom of the screen you can see the current day and time, and access the time control buttons (Pause, Normal Speed, Fast Speed, and Ultra Speed). You can also use the [0], [1], [2], and [3] keys on your keyboard. When all the Sims on the Lot are asleep and you go to Ultra Speed, time goes by even faster!

Challah is a type of bread often baked for Jewish celebrations such as Shabbat. Typically, challah is prepared in a way that's pareve in that it doesn't combine dairy products with egg. The bread loaves are braided and, on Rosh Hashanah, are often presented in a round "turban" form. On Shabbat, two loaves of challah are covered with a cloth that can be rather elaborately embroidered or decorated and Kiddush blessings are recited before the bread is sliced and eaten.

Depending upon the occasion, challah may be served sprinkled with salt or with honey and in some cultures raisins, dates, or other ingredients may even be added! No matter how you slice it, this rich and eggy bread is a delicious treat that helps unite people all around the world.
